content: **crocheted blanket with granny squares in drops paris ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-897 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx width = 88 cm length = 128 cm 34-5/8 x 50-3/8 **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 650 g colour 17 off white 150 g colour 71 tangerine 100 g colour 35 vanilla 100 g colour 41 mustard 100 g colour 58 powder pink 100 g colour 66 plum 100 g colour 68 almond 100 g colour 70 cherry blossom 50 g colour 01 apricot 50 g colour 27 peach 50 g colour 64 amethyst 50 g colour 65 rust 50 g colour 67 wheat use approx 1300-1350 g drops paris for a uni-coloured piece 1 square weighs approx 12-13 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 5 5 mm **crochet gauge ** 1 square measures approx 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if the square measures more than this switch to a smaller hook if the square measures less than this switch to a larger hook
